channel.title: Eny one got the code for objects to give out xp
channel.description:
Could some one help me out with the code so when you click on an object it gives you xp... For exampal range target for range and so on...
Thanks if you help out ;D

item.title: Eny one got the code for objects to give out xp
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

case ####: if (actionTimer < 1) { actionTimer = 15; addSkillXP(amount, skill#here); setAnimation(animationID); sendMessage("The message you would like to be sent to the player when they click the object."); } else { sendMessage("You can't click that fast!"); } break;

Read full topic
item.source: Eny one got the code for objects to give out xp
